statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, location FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 50
SELECT id, product_name, location FROM inventory_levels WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%'
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, location, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT id, product_name, location FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity < 50 AND location IN ('Warehouse B', 'Warehouse C') ORDER BY id
SELECT product_name, quantity, location, last_updated FROM inventory_levels WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity_sold, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM products JOIN transactions ON products.id = transactions.product_id GROUP BY name ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC
SELECT name AS product_name, quantity AS available_quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT p.name AS product_name, t.quantity_sold, t.transaction_date FROM products p JOIN transactions t ON p.id = t.product_id WHERE t.quantity_sold > 5 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(quantity_sold) AS avg_quantity_sold FROM transactions WHERE quantity_sold > 0
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Product WHERE stock_location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM Transaction ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity * price AS total_price FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product ORDER BY category ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Inventory;
SELECT p.product_name, t.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM Transaction t JOIN Product p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.quantity > 10 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale';
SELECT username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, quantity, qr_code FROM Inventory INNER JOIN QRCode ON Inventory.product_id = QRCode.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, qr_code FROM Inventory JOIN QRCode ON Inventory.product_id = QRCode.product_id WHERE qr_code LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, o.order_date FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.customer_id = 10 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE DATE_PART('month', transaction_date) = 11 AND DATE_PART('year', transaction_date) = 2022 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
